changeSet.sql:
create sequence customer_seq start 1 increment 1; create table customer ( id bigint not null default nextval('customer_seq'::regclass) primary key, first_name varchar(100) not null, last_name varchar(100) not null, birth_date date, email varchar(100) not null unique, phone_number varchar(13) );
create table address ( customer_id bigint references customer, name varchar(100) not null unique, country varchar(50) not null, city varchar(100) not null, zipcode varchar(10) not null );
